name: StyxQuest (lemonzestdoodle)
description:
Hell. The Big H. Way-Further-Down Under.

These are a few names that humans have given to the realm of demons. Many demons risk their lives daily, making contact with the human realm for a wide variety of reasons. Only the strongest have the privilege of being able to physically travel there.

You are an insignificant demon who wants to expand their horizons. And you'll do whatever it takes to achieve your goal.

THIS GAME CONTAINS THE FOLLOWING:

-A rough art style that bleeds texture

-Simplistic battle system

-All Seven Sins to spice up your battles

-Ambient tunes to wander/explore to

-Charming dialogue

Additional tracks by GalaticGlitch and iodbc
